\section{Introduction}

The {\Tt{}mesh{\_}mex\nwendquote} module provides the Matlab interface to the 
mesh routines.


\section{Interface}

\nwfilename{mesh-mex.nw}\nwbegincode{1}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-2EZjTk-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-2EZjTk-1}}}\moddef{mesh-mex.h~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-2EZjTk-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
#ifndef MESH_MEX_H
#define MESH_MEX_H

#include <mex.h>
#include <mesh.h>

void mesh_mex_register();
void mesh_mex_shutdown();
int  mesh_mex_handle_tag();

mesh_t       mx_to_mesh    (const mxArray* array);
mesh_node_t* mx_to_node    (mesh_t mesh, const mxArray* array);
material_t*  mx_to_material(mesh_t mesh, const mxArray* array);
mxArray*     mx_from_param (mesh_param_t* param);
mxArray*     mx_from_params(mesh_t mesh);

#endif /* MESH_MEX_H */
\nwnotused{mesh-mex.h}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{2}\nwdocspar

The {\Tt{}mesh{\_}mex{\_}register\nwendquote} command registers {\Tt{}addpath\nwendquote},
{\Tt{}use\nwendquote}, {\Tt{}freemesh\nwendquote}, and {\Tt{}printmesh\nwendquote} commands with
the main MEX routine.

The {\Tt{}mesh{\_}mex{\_}shutdown\nwendquote} command frees the local memory
associated with the {\Tt{}mesh{\_}mex\nwendquote} routines.

\subsection{Mesh reader data structures}

The {\Tt{}pool\nwendquote}, {\Tt{}model{\_}mgr\nwendquote}, and {\Tt{}uses{\_}mgr\nwendquote} are the main memory
pool, model manager, and path manager, respectively.  It makes sense
for each of those objects to have global lifetime, so this is not
a terrible place for them.

The handle tag type for a mesh handle is {\Tt{}mesh{\_}handle{\_}tag\nwendquote}.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{5}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-IAwJm-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-IAwJm-1}}}\moddef{static data~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-IAwJm-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static mempool_t       pool;
static model_mgr_t     model_mgr;
static uses_manager_t  uses_mgr;
static int             mesh_handle_tag;

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{6}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{7}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}}\moddef{functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup
void mesh_mex_register()
\{
    pool      = mempool_create(MEMPOOL_DEFAULT_SPAN);
    model_mgr = model_mgr_init();
    uses_mgr  = uses_manager_create(pool);

    uses_manager_envpath(uses_mgr, "SUGAR_LUA_PATH");
    uses_manager_addfunc(uses_mgr, path_via_matlab, NULL);

    model_test_register         (model_mgr);
    model_matlab_register       (model_mgr);
    model_mf2wrap_register      (model_mgr);
    model_mgr_standard_register (model_mgr);

    mesh_handle_tag = mex_handle_new_tag();
    \LA{}register mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-1}}\RA{}
\}

\nwalsodefined{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-2}\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-3}\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-4}\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-5}\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-6}\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-7}\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-8}}\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{8}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{9}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-2}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-2}}}\moddef{functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-3}\nwenddeflinemarkup
void mesh_mex_shutdown()
\{
    mempool_destroy   (pool);
    model_mgr_destroy (model_mgr);
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{10}\nwdocspar

\}

\subsection{Conversion functions}

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{13}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-4}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-4}}}\moddef{functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-3}{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-5}\nwenddeflinemarkup
mesh_t mx_to_mesh(const mxArray* array)
\{
    return mx_to_handle(array, mesh_handle_tag, "Invalid mesh handle");
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{14}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{15}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-5}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-5}}}\moddef{functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-4}{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-6}\nwenddeflinemarkup
mesh_node_t* mx_to_node(mesh_t mesh, const mxArray* array)
\{
    int node_id;
    mesh_node_t* node;

    if (!mxIsNumeric(array))
        mexErrMsgTxt("Invalid node identifier");

    node_id = (int) mx_to_double(array);
    node = mesh_node(mesh, node_id);
    if (node == NULL)
        mexErrMsgTxt("Invalid node identifier");

    return node;
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{16}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{17}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-6}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-6}}}\moddef{functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-5}{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-7}\nwenddeflinemarkup
material_t* mx_to_material(mesh_t mesh, const mxArray* array)
\{
    int material_id;
    material_t* material;

    if (!mxIsNumeric(array))
        mexErrMsgTxt("Invalid material identifier");

    material_id = (int) mx_to_double(array);
    material = mesh_material(mesh, material_id);
    if (material == NULL)
        mexErrMsgTxt("Invalid node identifier");

    return material;
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{18}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{19}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-7}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-7}}}\moddef{functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-6}{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-8}\nwenddeflinemarkup
mxArray* mx_from_param(mesh_param_t* param)
\{
    mxArray* value;

    if (param == NULL) \{
        value = mxCreateDoubleMatrix(0, 0, mxREAL);
    \} else if (param->tag == MESH_PARAM_NUMBER) \{
        value = mx_from_double(param->val.d);
    \} else if (param->tag == MESH_PARAM_STRING) \{
        value = mxCreateString(param->val.s);
    \} else if (param->tag == MESH_PARAM_MATRIX) \{
        value = mxCreateDoubleMatrix(param->val.m.m, param->val.m.n, mxREAL);
        memcpy(mxGetPr(value), param->val.m.data,
               param->val.m.m * param->val.m.n * sizeof(double));
    \} else
        mxAssert(0, "Invalid SUGAR parameter type");
    
    return value;
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{20}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{21}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-8}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-8}}}\moddef{functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-7}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
mxArray* mx_from_params(mesh_t mesh)
\{
    int i, n;
    const char** names;
    mxArray* result;

    n     = mesh_num_params(mesh);
    names = mxCalloc(n, sizeof(char*));
    for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)
        names[i] = mesh_param(mesh, i)->name;

    result = mxCreateStructMatrix(1,1,n,names);
    mxFree(names);

    for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)
        mxSetFieldByNumber(result, 0, i, mx_from_param(mesh_param(mesh, i)));

    return result;
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{22}\nwdocspar


\subsection{Looking up files in the Matlab path}

The Matlab command {\Tt{}which\nwendquote} searches Matlab's path for an instance
of a specified filename.  When we are within the Matlab environment,
we want to search for all files (including Lua files) in the Matlab
path, assuming we don't find them with the standard uses manager
paths first.  The alternative, to have different paths for different
types of files, seems to confuse Windows users who may not have
had the benefit of learning about distinct {\Tt{}LD{\_}LIBRARY{\_}PATH\nwendquote},
{\Tt{}PATH\nwendquote}, and related variables.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{23}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-1}}}\moddef{static functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static char* path_via_matlab(void* data, char* namebuf, unsigned buflen)
\{
    mxArray* prhs;
    mxArray* plhs;
    int status;
    char* path;

    prhs = mxCreateString(namebuf);
    status = mexCallMATLAB(1, &plhs, 1, &prhs, "which");
    mxDestroyArray(prhs);

    if (status != 0) \{
        return NULL;
    \}

    path = mx_to_string(plhs);
    if (*path != 0 && strlen(path) + 1 <= buflen) \{
        strcpy(namebuf, path);
        mxFree(path);
        return namebuf;
    \} else \{
        mxFree(path);
        return NULL;
    \}
\}

\nwalsodefined{\\{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-2}\\{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-3}\\{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-4}}\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{24}\nwdocspar


\subsection{{\Tt{}addpath\nwendquote} command}

The {\Tt{}addpath(path)\nwendquote} function adds {\Tt{}path\nwendquote} to the 
{\Tt{}uses\nwendquote} manager search path.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{25}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-16QO0C-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-16QO0C-1}}}\moddef{cho-addpath.m~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-16QO0C-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
% Adds to the netlist search path.
%
% When netlists are accessed via cho_load or via a 'use' command inside
% another netlist, SUGAR searches in the current directory and then in
% the directories on the netlist search path.  cho_addpath adds a new
% directory to the netlist search path.
%
% Inputs:
%   path -- name of the file system path to be added.

function cho_addpath(path)
sugarmex('addpath', path);
\nwnotused{cho-addpath.m}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{26}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{27}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-1}}}\moddef{register mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup
mexmgr_add("addpath", mex_addpath);
\nwalsodefined{\\{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-2}\\{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-3}\\{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-4}\\{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-5}\\{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-6}\\{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-7}\\{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-8}\\{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-9}\\{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-A}\\{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-B}}\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{28}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{29}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-1}}}\moddef{mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void mex_addpath(int nlhs, mxArray* plhs[],
                        int nrhs, const mxArray* prhs[])
\{
    int i;
    for (i = 0; i < nrhs; ++i) \{
        char* name = mx_to_string(prhs[i]);
        uses_manager_addpath(uses_mgr, name);
        mxFree(name);
    \}
\}

\nwalsodefined{\\{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-2}\\{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-3}\\{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-4}\\{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-5}\\{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-6}\\{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-7}\\{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-8}\\{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-9}\\{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-A}\\{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-B}\\{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-C}}\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{30}\nwdocspar


\subsection{{\Tt{}load\nwendquote} command}

The {\Tt{}load(file)\nwendquote} function finds the (Lua) netlist {\Tt{}file\nwendquote} and
executes it.  The function returns a handle to the generated mesh.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{31}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-f4oy-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-f4oy-1}}}\moddef{cho-load.m~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-f4oy-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
% Load a netlist description into the SUGAR internal format.
%
% Inputs: 
%   netname - netlist file name
%   param   - (Optional) parameter settings
%
% Outputs:
%   net - pointer to netlist structure

function [handle] = cho_load(file, params)
if nargin == 1
  handle = sugarmex('use', file);
else
  handle = sugarmex('use', file, params);
end
\nwnotused{cho-load.m}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{32}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{33}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-2}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-2}}}\moddef{register mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-1}{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-3}\nwenddeflinemarkup
mexmgr_add("use", mex_use);
\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{34}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{35}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-2}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-2}}}\moddef{mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-1}{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-3}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void mex_use(int nlhs, mxArray* plhs[],
                    int nrhs, const mxArray* prhs[])
\{
    char        name[256];
    mesh_t      mesh;
    lua_State*  L;

    if (nrhs < 1 || !mxIsChar(prhs[0]))
        mexErrMsgTxt("Syntax: sugarmex('use', filename, [params])");

    mxGetString(prhs[0], name, sizeof(name));
    if (uses_manager_search(uses_mgr, name, sizeof(name)) == NULL) \{
        mexPrintf("Could not find %s\\n", name);
        mexErrMsgTxt("Error loading file");
    \}
    
    L = lua_open(0);

    lua_usesmgrlib(L);
    lua_set_usesmgr(L, uses_mgr);
    lua_baselibopen(L);
    lua_iolibopen(L);
    lua_mathlibopen(L);
    lua_register(L, "_ALERT", lua_alert);

    if (nrhs >= 2) \{
        if (mxIsStruct(prhs[1])) \{
            \LA{}transfer parameters to Lua environment~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-1PuHjt-1}}\RA{}
        \} else \{
            lua_close(L);
            mexErrMsgTxt("Parameters must be passed via structure");
        \}
    \}

    mesh = mesh_lua_load(L, uses_mgr, name, model_mgr, lua_mesh_error_handler);
    lua_close(L);

    if (mesh == NULL)
        mexErrMsgTxt("Error while interpreting net file");

    if (nlhs == 0) \{
        mesh_destroy(mesh);
    \} else \{
        mesh_set_handlers(mesh, matlab_mesh_error_handler, 
                          matlab_mesh_warning_handler, NULL);
        plhs[0] = mx_from_double(mex_handle_add(mesh, mesh_handle_tag));
    \}
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{36}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{37}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-1PuHjt-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-1PuHjt-1}}}\moddef{transfer parameters to Lua environment~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-1PuHjt-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-2}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
const mxArray* params = prhs[1];
int nfields = mxGetNumberOfFields(params);
int ifield;

for (ifield = 0; ifield < nfields; ++ifield) \{
    const char* name = mxGetFieldNameByNumber(params, ifield);
    mxArray* field = mxGetFieldByNumber(params, 0, ifield);
    if (mxIsChar(field)) \{
        lua_pushstring(L, mx_to_string(field));
    \} else if (mxIsDouble(field)) \{
        lua_pushnumber(L, *mxGetPr(field));
    \} else \{
        lua_close(L);
        mexErrMsgTxt("Only real scalars and strings allowed");
    \}
    lua_setglobal(L, name);
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-2}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{38}\nwdocspar

After the initial phase where we use Lua, we want any mesh errors
to be reported via the standard Matlab reporting functions.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{39}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-2}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-2}}}\moddef{static functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-1}{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-3}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void matlab_mesh_error_handler(void* arg, const char* msg)
\{
    mexErrMsgTxt(msg);
\}

static void matlab_mesh_warning_handler(void* arg, const char* msg)
\{
    mexPrintf("Warning: %s\\n", msg);
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{40}\nwdocspar

When we are inside Lua, we make mesh errors generate Lua errors.
The Lua errors in turn generate calls to {\Tt{}{\_}ALERT\nwendquote}, which prints
using the MEX version of {\Tt{}printf\nwendquote}.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{41}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-3}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-3}}}\moddef{static functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-2}{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-4}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void lua_mesh_error_handler(void* arg, const char* msg)
\{
    lua_State* L = (lua_State*) arg;
    lua_error(L, msg);
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{42}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{43}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-4}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-4}}}\moddef{static functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-1duChy-3}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static int lua_alert(lua_State* L)
\{
    int n = lua_gettop(L);  /* number of arguments */
    const char* s;

    lua_getglobal(L, "tostring");
    lua_pushvalue(L, 1);
    lua_rawcall(L, 1, 1);

    s = lua_tostring(L, -1);
    if (s != NULL)
        mexPrintf("%s", s);

    lua_settop(L, 0);
    return 0;
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{44}\nwdocspar


\subsection{{\Tt{}freemesh\nwendquote} command}

The {\Tt{}mesh{\_}free(handle)\nwendquote} function frees the mesh indicated by {\Tt{}handle\nwendquote}.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{45}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-3Sxgux-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3Sxgux-1}}}\moddef{cho-mesh-free.m~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3Sxgux-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
% Deallocates a netlist structure.
%
% Note that using the Matlab 'clear' command does not deallocate the
% internal data structures used by SUGAR.  Use cho_mesh_free to deallocate
% such structures.  In particular, it is a good idea to use cho_mesh_free
% if you are doing a parameter sweep and creating lots of new netlist
% data structures.
%
% Inputs:
%   net -- a pointer to the netlist structure to be deallocated

function cho_mesh_free(handle)
sugarmex('mesh_free', handle);
\nwnotused{cho-mesh-free.m}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{46}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{47}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-3}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-3}}}\moddef{register mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-2}{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-4}\nwenddeflinemarkup
mexmgr_add("mesh_free", mex_mesh_free);
\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{48}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{49}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-3}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-3}}}\moddef{mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-2}{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-4}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void mex_mesh_free(int nlhs, mxArray* plhs[],
                          int nrhs, const mxArray* prhs[])
\{
    mex_check_num_args(nrhs, 1);
    mesh_destroy(mx_to_mesh(prhs[0]));
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{50}\nwdocspar

as the output from a {\Tt{}mesh{\_}print\nwendquote} command.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{71}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-6}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-6}}}\moddef{mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-5}{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-7}\nwenddeflinemarkup

                             int nrhs, const mxArray* prhs[])

static void mex_num_nodes(int nlhs, mxArray* plhs[],
                          int nrhs, const mxArray* prhs[])

\}

\subsection{{\Tt{}mesh{\_}node{\_}pos\nwendquote} and {\Tt{}mesh{\_}node{\_}name\nwendquote} commands}

The {\Tt{}mesh{\_}node{\_}pos(mesh{\_}handle,\ node{\_}id)\nwendquote} and 
{\Tt{}mesh{\_}node{\_}name(mesh{\_}handle,\ node{\_}id)\nwendquote} commands find the name
and position of an indicated node.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{73}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-1gBQRo-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-1gBQRo-1}}}\moddef{cho-mesh-node.m~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-1gBQRo-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
% Return a description (name and position) of a netlist node.
%
% Inputs:
%   net     -- netlist handle
%   node_id -- node number
%
% Outputs:
%   node.name -- name of the node
%       .x    -- position of the node

function [node] = cho_mesh_node(handle, node_id)

node.name = sugarmex('mesh_node_name', handle, node_id);
node.x    = sugarmex('mesh_node_pos',  handle, node_id);
\nwnotused{cho-mesh-node.m}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{74}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{75}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-7}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-7}}}\moddef{register mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-6}{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-8}\nwenddeflinemarkup
mexmgr_add("mesh_node_pos", mex_get_node_pos);
mexmgr_add("mesh_node_name", mex_get_node_name);
\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{76}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{77}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-7}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-7}}}\moddef{mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-6}{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-8}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void mex_get_node_name(int nlhs, mxArray* plhs[],
                              int nrhs, const mxArray* prhs[])
\{
    mesh_t       mesh;
    mesh_node_t* node;

    mex_check_num_args(nrhs, 1);
    mesh = mx_to_mesh(prhs[0]);
    node = mx_to_node(mesh, prhs[1]);

    plhs[0] = mxCreateString((node->name != NULL) ? node->name : "");
\}

static void mex_get_node_pos(int nlhs, mxArray* plhs[],
                             int nrhs, const mxArray* prhs[])
\{
    mesh_t       mesh;
    mesh_node_t* node;

    mex_check_num_args(nrhs, 1);
    mesh = mx_to_mesh(prhs[0]);
    node = mx_to_node(mesh, prhs[1]);

    plhs[0] = mxCreateDoubleMatrix(3,1,mxREAL);
    memcpy(mxGetPr(plhs[0]), node->x, 3 * sizeof(double));
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{78}\nwdocspar


\subsection{{\Tt{}mesh{\_}node{\_}lookup\nwendquote} command}

The {\Tt{}mesh{\_}node{\_}lookup(mesh{\_}handle,\ node{\_}name)\nwendquote} command
finds the index of a node with a particular name.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{79}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-2jDEsd-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-2jDEsd-1}}}\moddef{cho-mesh-node-lookup.m~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-2jDEsd-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
% Find the index of a netlist node with a particular name.
%
% Inputs:
%   net      -- pointer to a netlist structure
%   nodename -- name of a node in the netlist
%
% Outputs:
%   node_id  -- node number.  If no match is found, node_id = [].

function [node] = cho_mesh_node_lookup(handle, nodename)
node = sugarmex('mesh_node_lookup', handle, nodename);
\nwnotused{cho-mesh-node-lookup.m}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{80}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{81}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-8}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-8}}}\moddef{register mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-7}{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-9}\nwenddeflinemarkup
mexmgr_add("mesh_node_lookup", mex_mesh_node_lookup);
\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{82}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{83}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-8}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-8}}}\moddef{mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-7}{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-9}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void mex_mesh_node_lookup(int nlhs, mxArray* plhs[],
                                 int nrhs, const mxArray* prhs[])
\{
    mesh_t       mesh;
    mesh_node_t* node;
    const char*  name;
    int          nnodes;
    int          i;

    mex_check_num_args(nrhs, 2);
    mesh = mx_to_mesh(prhs[0]);
    name = mx_to_string(prhs[1]);
    nnodes = mesh_num_nodes(mesh);

    for (i = 1; i <= nnodes; ++i) \{
        if (strcmp(name, mesh_node(mesh, i)->name) == 0) \{
            plhs[0] = mx_from_double(i);
            return;
        \}
    \}

    plhs[0] = mx_from_nil();
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{84}\nwdocspar



\subsection{{\Tt{}mesh{\_}material{\_}param\nwendquote} command}

The {\Tt{}mesh{\_}material{\_}param(mesh,\ material{\_}id,\ name)\nwendquote} command gets a
parameter from a specified material.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{85}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-2kSmdb-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-2kSmdb-1}}}\moddef{cho-mesh-material-param.m~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-2kSmdb-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
% Return a parameter retrieved from a mesh material.
%
% Inputs:
%   net         -- pointer to netlist structure
%   material_id -- material number
%   name        -- parameter name
%
% Outputs:
%   param       -- material parameter value

function [param] = cho_mesh_material_param(handle, material, name)
param = sugarmex('mesh_material_param', handle, material, name);
\nwnotused{cho-mesh-material-param.m}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{86}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{87}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-9}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-9}}}\moddef{register mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-8}{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-A}\nwenddeflinemarkup
mexmgr_add("mesh_material_param", mex_material_param);
\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{88}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{89}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-9}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-9}}}\moddef{mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-8}{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-A}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void mex_material_param(int nlhs, mxArray* plhs[],
                               int nrhs, const mxArray* prhs[])
\{
    mesh_t        mesh;
    material_t*   material;
    char*         name;
    mesh_param_t* param;

    mex_check_num_args(nrhs, 3);
    mesh     = mx_to_mesh(prhs[0]);
    material = mx_to_material(mesh, prhs[1]);
    name     = mx_to_string(prhs[2]);

    if (material->model->param)
        param = (material->model->param)(material->data, name);

    mxFree(name);
    plhs[0] = mx_from_param(param);
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{90}\nwdocspar


\subsection{{\Tt{}mesh{\_}param\nwendquote}}

The {\Tt{}mesh{\_}param(mesh,\ id)\nwendquote} function gets a parameter by name or
numeric identifier.  The {\Tt{}mesh{\_}params(mesh)\nwendquote} function gets all
the parameters in a structure.  The Matlab interface function
can be called as {\Tt{}cho{\_}mesh{\_}param(mesh)\nwendquote} to get all parameters
in a structure, {\Tt{}cho{\_}mesh{\_}param(mesh,\ name)\nwendquote} to get a named
parameter, or {\Tt{}cho{\_}mesh{\_}param(mesh,\ material,\ name)\nwendquote} to get a named
parameter from material or mesh.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{91}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-4XwISz-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-4XwISz-1}}}\moddef{cho-mesh-param.m~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-4XwISz-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
function [param] = cho_mesh_param(mesh, arg1, arg2)

if nargin == 1
    param = sugarmex('mesh_params', mesh);
elseif nargin == 2
    param = sugarmex('mesh_param', mesh, arg1);
elseif nargin == 3
    param = sugarmex('mesh_param', mesh, arg2);
    if (isempty(param))
        param = sugarmex('mesh_material_param', mesh, arg1, arg2)
    end
end
\nwnotused{cho-mesh-param.m}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{92}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{93}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-A}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-A}}}\moddef{register mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-9}{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-B}\nwenddeflinemarkup
mexmgr_add("mesh_param",  mex_mesh_param );
mexmgr_add("mesh_params", mex_mesh_params);
\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{94}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{95}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-A}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-A}}}\moddef{mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-9}{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-B}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void mex_mesh_params(int nlhs, mxArray* plhs[],
                            int nrhs, const mxArray* prhs[])
\{
    mesh_t mesh;
    int i, n;
    const char** names;

    mex_check_num_args(nrhs, 1);
    mesh = mx_to_mesh(prhs[0]);

    plhs[0] = mx_from_params(mesh);
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{96}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{97}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-B}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-B}}}\moddef{mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-A}{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-C}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void mex_mesh_param(int nlhs, mxArray* plhs[],
                           int nrhs, const mxArray* prhs[])
\{
    mesh_t mesh;

    mex_check_num_args(nrhs, 2);
    mesh = mx_to_mesh(prhs[0]);

    if (mxIsChar(prhs[1])) \{
        char* name = mx_to_string(prhs[1]);
        plhs[0] = mx_from_param(mesh_param_byname(mesh, NULL, name));
    \} else \{
        int i = (int) mx_to_double(prhs[1]);
        plhs[0] = mx_from_param(mesh_param(mesh, i));
    \}
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{98}\nwdocspar


\subsection{{\Tt{}mesh{\_}nodes\nwendquote}}

The {\Tt{}mesh{\_}nodes(mesh)\nwendquote} function returns the current vector of node
identifiers.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{99}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-1ZmpFC-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-1ZmpFC-1}}}\moddef{cho-mesh-param-nodes.m~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-1ZmpFC-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
function [nodes] = cho_mesh_param_nodes(mesh)
nodes = sugarmex('mesh_param_nodes', mesh);
\nwnotused{cho-mesh-param-nodes.m}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{100}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{101}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-B}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-B}}}\moddef{register mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-Ye2uh-A}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
mexmgr_add("mesh_param_nodes", mex_mesh_param_nodes);
\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-nRuDO-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{102}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{103}\sublabel{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-C}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-C}}}\moddef{mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3HEBcB-3MtIgE-B}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void mex_mesh_param_nodes(int nhls, mxArray* plhs[],
                                 int nrhs, const mxArray* prhs[])
\{
    mesh_t mesh;
    int i, n;
    double* data;

    mex_check_num_args(nrhs, 1);    
    mesh = mx_to_mesh(prhs[0]);

    n = mesh_num_param_nodes(mesh);
    plhs[0] = mxCreateDoubleMatrix(n,1,mxREAL);

    data = mxGetPr(plhs[0]);
    for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)
        data[i] = mesh_param_node(mesh, i);
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3HEBcB-4J1Dpw-1}}\nwendcode{}
